programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.desc: A daughter must grapple with the loss of her father as she struggles to preserve his legacy and save his bar, Cap'n Odie's Lounge.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon must help a struggling establishment figure out if it's a club, a restaurant, or a bar, in the highly competitive market of Las Vegas.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A Las Vegas dive struggles under an owner who makes more enemies than friends, so it's up to Jon to step in and teach a lesson on civility.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon looks to rescue the bars of tomorrow by giving hospitality students at UNLV a one-week crash course on running a successful bar.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch's ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit. She introduces her new fiancé Ken and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie back to Ohio with her. When Ken's private jet crashes in the ocean on takeoff, the Baywatch team have to rescue them!

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in the rapidly flooding fuselage beneath the sea while Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards mount a massive rescue effort to save the trapped passengers and crew.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Romance is in the air at Baywatch as Mitch and Jackie's friendship grows more intense, Summer and Matt begin a relationship, and Hobie falls in love with Lauren, a junior lifeguard with a devastating secret.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: John D. Cort, Mitch's friend and a former lifeguard, returns to Baywatch where his life undergoes a devastating change. Meanwhile, Hobie meets a very "unique" new friend.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Summer has love problems when Slade returns from a world surfing tour to discover Matt and Summer are dating. CJ is persistently pursued by a bungee jumping balloonist. Meanwhile, Garner patrols the beach on horseback.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage by a beautiful woman and forced to perform surgery on her escaped convict husband. Meanwhile, Matt and Slade decide to settle their mutual affection for Summer in a daring surfing contest.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he and his wife have every intention of killing him. Stephanie's sister Caroline arrives with her fiancé, who becomes the target of an attempted murder.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD and is left reevaluating his life as a lifeguard.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch's impending birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, getting swept off his feet by a younger woman along the way. Matt takes a night job to save money for a motorcycle, jeopardizing his coworkers through his exhaustion.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity, and CJ is enamored with a beach magician who nearly drowns during a bungled underwater stunt.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics, becoming involved with two young physically-challenged athletes whose parents have abandoned them.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Jesse Majors, the beautiful motorcycle racer that Matt fell in love with, returns, putting strain on Matt and Summer’s relationship.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar brawl and Ben's resignation. Meanwhile, Mitch helps deliver a baby when the mother goes into premature labor while swimming at the beach.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by the hotel's legendary ghost. CJ grows attached to an orphaned dolphin at Sea World. And Mitch is stranded at sea with his brother when their sailboat capsizes.

programme.desc: Bellator 289: Stots vs. Sabatello was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA that took place on December 9, 2022, at the Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Connecticut, United States.

programme.desc: Bellator 293: Golm vs. James was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA that took place on March 31, 2023, at the Pechanga Resort and Casino in Temecula, California, United States.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator 294: Carmouche vs. Bennett 2 was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA that took place on April 21, 2023, at the Neal S. Blaisdell Arena in Honolulu, Hawaii, United States.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Trisha & Danielle are angry with dad, Ron, who they say abandoned their dying mother, his wife of 30 yrs, to plan a wedding with a Kennedy heiress he met online. His daughters say "Misty Kennedy" is a catfish. Ron says "Misty" is the love of his life.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Kathi says son, Nico, 14, plays video games all day & charged thousands buying tokens. Nico attended only six days of school this year & when disciplined, Nico rages, curses & terrorizes. Kathi says he learned this behavior from his dad, Evo; Evo agrees.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his work with a family ripped apart by accusations of child molestation. Father Jason agrees to take a polygraph test to prove his innocence. Tune in to find out the results and what's next for this family!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Aja says she is tired of caring for her entitled, drug-addicted mother, Janet, by allowing her to live with her for 8 of 10 years of her own marriage. Aja cites costs of $100,000. Janet rejects: she pays rent & regularly goes to Narcotics Anonymous.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Caylee Anthony's image has been splashed across magazine covers and TV screens in an effort to find the missing 3-year-old. With the bizarre twists and turns in this story, Dr. Phil's panel of experts probe into the case that has captivated millions.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Binge drinking has increasingly become a way of life and death on college campuses. Dr. Phil talks to two 20-somethings who admit to binge drinking regularly, but say they are not alcoholics. Will one family's painful loss convince these two to sober up?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dustin, Chance & Nova say mom Sonya, is a liar & manipulator, neglecting them--deplorable conditions, no food, no hot water. They say mom bought fast food for herself & her boyfriend as they starved. Then she disappeared. Sonya says she doesn't remember.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Josie, 64, says she has met the love of her life, Victor, on Facebook. He’s Nigerian, 30 years younger, she has never physically met him, yet insists it's true love. Dr. Phil took cameras to Nigeria to find Victor, to see if he’s telling Josie the truth.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Can married people be friends with someone of the opposite sex without sex getting in the way? At what point does a friendly relationship become an affair of the heart or emotional infidelity? Meet Randy, who says his wife, Amanda, has crossed that line.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Former Subway spokesman Jared Fogle caught on tape. Listen to the shocking, never-before-heard audio recordings. Former journalist Rochelle Herman-Walrond secretly taped the pitchman for years as part of the FBI's investigation. Pt. 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Jennifer says son, Alex, 12, is addicted to violent video games, spending 20 hours straight killing people in an online gaming world; she fears it may be a catalyst for him to become the next school shooter. Shocking home video of his violent behaviors.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Melissa, 26, left home without warning & flew 2,000 miles across the country, leaving behind a note that said, "One day, Dr. Phil will be able to help me." The family says she hadn't "been herself." Melissa says she's ready to tell why she vanished.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Horrific allegations are tearing a family apart. Todd, ex girlfriend Latia & mom Diana tell their versions of sexual misconduct. Todd says he will do anything to prove his innocence. Dr. Phil calls in a polygraph examiner, with shocking results.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Connie wrote Dr. Phil for help, concerned for her grandchildren. Jennifer's daughter drank bleach from her sippy cup when she was 3 and was found with a backpack of maggots, mold and rotten milk at 7. Dr. Phil delves into Jennifer's history as a parent.

channel.display-name: Best of The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Dr. Charles Sophyis joining Drew. Plus, an all-new Drew-gooderfeaturing a hero mailman. Drew and Ross Mathewsare serving the news sunny-side upin an all-newDrew's News!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Kristina Zias talks nostalgic fashion trends and wedding etiquette with Drew & Ross Mathews. Brendan Fraser's comeback and scientific reasons behind listening to sad songs on Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Inside Edition's Deborah Norville is telling Drew all about Inside Edition's 35th anniversary and her career as a journalist.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew's chat with Michelle Obama continues and she's talking all about making friends in the White House and more.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The celebration continues, and Drew's birthday twin Rachel Dratch has a delicious surprise for her when she joinsDrew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: David Duchovny talks about his career and upcoming rom-com with Drew. Kirby Howell-Baptiste joins Drew and Ross for Drew's News, discussing dating and British foods.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are at the Drew's News desk covering headlines like the woman who spent 500 days in a cave to study how people cope with being underground.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Comedian Celeste Barber, known for her hilarious celebrity parodies, joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover the latest headlines including the one perk employees most wish their employer would offer and share Rihanna's latest collab.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Shotgun Wedding" star D'Arcy Carden is joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover today's hottest stories like the woman who invited all her ex-boyfriends to her wedding and put them at a table together and the newest trend of eating alone.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: At Midnight" star Whitney Cummings is joining Drew to take a bungee fitness class! She's also covering the news with Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk including why women may smell different after leaving a boyfriend's place.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Bill Nye The Science Guy are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, Chef Pilar Valdes reveals five essential pantry items and turns them into a delicious dish.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are at the Drew's News desk and covering the hottest topics. Stephanie Izard is joining Drew in the kitchen to make something delicious. Eve Rodsky is sharing home equity tips.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Equalizer" star Queen Latifah stops by to chat. Plus, Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, In A Minute Ross is sharing an all new delicious Rossipe.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Horticulturist Christopher Freimuth shares holiday decor tips. Drew & Ross report on E.T. auction & benefits of being in the rain. James Warren talks about building benches at local bus stops.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving today's news sunny-side up. Danny Seo is sharing three under $30 bathroom essentials and tips for how to clean your toilet better.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Fashion Icon Victoria Beckham is dishing on her Paris Fashion Week debut, that signature leg pose, her daughter's thoughts on her Spice Girls wardrobe and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Plane" star Gerard Butler is chatting about his new film. Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up and covering the week's hottest headlines.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: We're celebrating the Oscars and style sheriffs Melissa Rivers, Law Roach and Christian Siriano are joining Drew and Ross Mathews for a special fashion panel.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Champions" director Bobby Farrelly is talking to Drew and joined by cast members Madison Tevlin, Kevin Iannucci and Joshua Felder to chat about the film. Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all-new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is joined by Garcelle Beauva is for a special female empowerment edition of Drew's News. "Claiming Space" author and mentor Eliza Van Cort is sharing tips for female empowerment and how to claim your space.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Emily in Paris" stars Lily Collins, Ashley Park, Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu and Lucas Bravo are joining Drew for a round of Drew & A. Pilar Valdes is joining Drew in the kitchen to whip up some yummy crepes.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Cameron Diaz cook and chat about their culinary adventures. Andrea Lavinthal recreates Drew's past looks.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Entertainment Tonight's Kevin Frazier and Nischelle Turner are joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk for a special Oscars themed Drew's News, sharing their predictions for the awards show.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is chatting with actress Katherine Heiglabout the return of "Firefly Lane" and more.Plus, inan all-new Drew's News, Katherine Heigl joinsDrew and Ross Mathewsat the news desk to hit the headlines.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson is filling in for Drew as co-host for the day! Comedian Ziwe Fumudoh stops by to chat about the new season of her late-night talk show "Ziwe.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Lena Dunham on her new medieval comedy film "Catherine Called Birdy." Plus, Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Paris in Love" star Paris Hilton joins Drew to chat. Then, CBS News Anchor Michelle Miller is helping Drew and Ross hit the headlines at the Drew's News desk.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When Mr. Drysdale is unhappy with Dr. Clyburn's treatment of his cold the Clampetts hear about it. Granny decides it's time to set up practice and enlists the rest of her family to help. She also claims a cure for the common cold.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The world's richest woman wants to buy the Clampett mansion and will stop at nothing to get it. Will Jed finally sell?

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny wants to learn to drive the truck but can't get used to modern day contraptions. A horse is more of what she wants and Mr. Drysdale gets her one, a professional race horse.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When Granny hears the Drysdales are at a horse show, she declares she wants good trotter so she can ride it to the market. When Mr. Drysdale buys a racer along with a buggy, Granny decides she wants to be the driver at the track.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny encounters an ostrich at the Drysdales and believe it's a giant chicken. She decides it got into her "medicinal tonic" and that's why it's so big. She tries to apply the idea to her vegetables.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts believe resuming his courtship of Elly is why Sonny Drysdale returns. His stepfather arranges a job as a beauty product salesman and his sixth stop at the Clampetts is where his merchandise is mistaken as courting gifts.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny, along with Elly, is heading back to the hills to do some doctoring. Mr. Drysdale is frantic to stop her so he reveals that the Brewsters are having a baby. Jethro brings home some girls from the Kit Kat Club so he won't be lonely.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: A shady magician sells his wares to the gullible Jethro.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed thinks Granny needs help in cleaning the mansion, but she believes it's because he wants to put her in a retirement home, so Granny is ready to head to the hills with her money, which Mr. Drysdale is desperate to avoid.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is bent on becoming an astronaut but gets sidetracked into teaming up with Miss Jane to become a folk singer. Along the way, Jethro invents a new musical device he dubs the Bodine o' phone.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Drysdale, at first irate that beautiful actress Bergstrom is kept on an expensive stipend without making a film, is smitten at first sight and so places the actress in the Clampett home to learn backwoods accents and ways for a movie.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro becomes a Hugh Hefner wannabe when he discovers some Playpen magazines in Mr. Drysdale's garage.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny remains eager to get Elly to the altar and decides Professor Biddle, Miss Jane's friend, will do. Mr. Drysdale blackmails Dash into asking the Clampett lass for a date. The meek birdwatcher and the handsome actor are soon at odds.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny brews a batch of her tonic hoping it helps Elly get a husband. Jane and Mr. Biddle are trying to hatch a condor egg but a sip of the potion changes the birdwatcher's focus and the Clampetts need to get him out of a tree.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny receives a box from Cousin Pearl in the hills. One of the items in the box is an old-fashioned crank telephone. Granny asks Jethro to hook it up to a party line on the pole, so she can listen in on the party line

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny despairs of Elly Mae ever finding a husband and decides to promote her non-existent cooking skills. She is entered into a TV show cook-off, but nothing she fixes is edible.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: A con artist pretends to be someone from back home and stays with the Clampetts. She plans to get photos of Jed in a compromising position in order to blackmail him.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro decides to sophisticate Emaline, but she has bigger plans for blackmailing Mr. Drysdale with her cuckoo clock camera. The colonel continues to woo Granny. The two swindlers though haven't met someone as sharp as Jed.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is chopping wood while a chimpanzee named May Bell watches. He wishes that he could teach May Bell to chop wood. When Elly May comes by, she and Jethro talk and decide that they want a gorilla.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts miss Herbie and ask Mr. Drysdale to get the tame gorilla back. The banker promises to help, but actually hinders the effort.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny's soap making sends noxious smoke into the air, which gets the attention of smog commissioner Tinsley. He shuts down the operation, and Jed decides to run against him when he misunderstands Mr. Drysdale's advice.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed takes a job on the board of directors of O.K. Oil Company.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is so desperate to meet a woman that when Miss Hathaway's bird watching group arrives, he goes out of his way to try to impress the women.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: In order to buy Mrs. Drysdale a special Christmas present, the Clampetts take seasonal jobs in a department store.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny discovers Martians next door at the Drysdale mansion.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny decides to take her share of the Clampett millions and move back home.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed and Granny decide to donate the burden of their millions to some college students and move back home.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E013) Pillow talk threatens to destroy Brenda's sleep-over as all the girls share their deepest secrets, with unexpected results.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E014) The Walsh's agree to let their maid's niece, Carla, use their address to enroll at West Beverly.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E015) A weekend in Palm Springs goes awry when David invites Steve, Kelly and Donna to join him at his grandparents' house while they're away on a cruise-but he gets the dates confused, and they're still there.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E016) Brandon is "discovered" when he's out roller-blading, landing a role as an emergency extra on a big TV show.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E017) Brenda's had it with home life and West Beverly and decides to leave both for the real world.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E018) The Walsh twins and all their friends are panicked by the upcoming SATs, but then everything gets put in perspective when Brenda finds a lump in her breast and faces a test no one can prepare for.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E019) Brandon interviews a classmate, Roger, who's an outstanding athlete and student--and haunted by the overbearing success of his father.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E020) Baseball fever strikes when Brandon is asked to coach a little league team after his dad gets injured.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E021) The drama and the stakes rise as the West Beverly High crew gets ready for their Spring Dance.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: In an effort to support Miss Kitty, Ceaser and the crew head down to Memphis, Tennessee so she can reconnect with her mother's roots. Krystal confronts Donna about her behavior during the lock-in. And Walt makes a serious go at standup comedy.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The crew continues their stay in Memphis to pay their respects to Kitty's mom. London decides to throw a house party to promote the brand down south. Walt prepares to take his relationship with Jessica to the next step.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: An unexpected drug test has Tati freaking out. Sky announces a huge surprise. Quani makes a decision that shocks Puma. Rok airs out his dirty laundry - literally. And problems with the Brooklyn shop puts Ceaser on a collision course with the police.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser deals with the fallout of his arrest, and what it means for the Brooklyn shop. Alex and Donna try to get their mojo back in the bedroom. Bae confronts a shocking diagnosis. And Sky embarks on a new venture.

programme.desc: After missing for a couple of weeks, Ted comes clean to Ceaser and Puma about why he's been so absent. Mike finally receives his long-awaited paternity test results. Jessica brings her son Xavier to meet Walt. Mike has a medical emergency.

programme.desc: The Brooklyn shop is finally open and Ceaser throws a block party to celebrate the grand opening. After Donna gives Alex an ultimatum, things don't go as expected. Crystal has a new jaw and a new attitude. Bae finds out Tati is hiding a big secret.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Maldito
programme.desc: Cuando un mafioso local es asesinado a tiros en su auto, Danny y Báez intentan obtener información del chico de los recados de bajo nivel de la mafia que encuentran atado en el maletero antes de que la pandilla tome represalias.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Viejos tiempos
programme.desc: Cuando el primer socio de Frank anuncia sus planes de publicar un libro lleno de historias de sus primeros días en la policía, a Frank le preocupa que sus historias personales se hagan públicas.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): A sangre fría
programme.desc: Cuando un teniente de la policía de Nueva York, recientemente retirado y bien considerado, es acusado de disparar a un grupo de posibles asaltantes en el metro y posteriormente desaparece, Frank debe enfrentar las consecuencias.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC ayuda a la hija periodista de Rossi, Joy (Amber Stevens West), a investigar la desaparición de una alumna de la universidad.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC está persiguiendo a un sospechoso en Phoenix que está secuestrando víctimas con insomnio. Además, Hotch y García se enfrentan a la amenaza del grupo de sicarios clandestinos, llamados“La docena sucia.”

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Tras la muerte de dos agentes encubiertos de la DEA y la desaparición de un tercero, el UAC se suma a la NSA para investigar si una red clandestina de drogas por Internet está involucrada.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que tal vez esté fascinado por inquietantes experimentos médicos.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Luego de un evento que acontece cerca de casa, el equipo de NCIS se une para buscar respuestas y pedir justicia en pos de proteger a los colegas más vulnerables.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El equipo de NCIS investiga el accidente de tránsito de un Marine y desata algunos tristes recuerdos de Abby cuando era una niña en búsqueda de rastros para resolver su "primer caso".

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El equipo de NCIS atrapa a un reconocido pirata informático que puede darles la llave para encontrar al mayor ciber terrorista del mundo.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El Director Vance, aún de luto por la pérdida de su mujer y la madre de sus hijos, descubre inesperada información personal que le generará dudas sobre absolutamente todo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): A sangre fría
programme.desc: Cuando un teniente de la policía de Nueva York, recientemente retirado y bien considerado, es acusado de disparar a un grupo de posibles asaltantes en el metro y posteriormente desaparece, Frank debe enfrentar las consecuencias.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El camino al infierno
programme.desc: Danny debe determinar quién asesinó a un hombre cuando varias mujeres que trabajaron para él se atribuyen el mérito.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Un nuevo comienzo
programme.desc: Erin se siente abrumada por la culpa después de que un hombre al que liberó es acusado de matar a un policía.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Michelle deals with Jared's friend overstaying his welcome while Chris and Aimee face a moral dilemma with Morgan. Doug and Wendy have their hands full with Presley who has started mimicking what they say...cursing included!

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug takes a leap of faith and tries dance lessons with Wendy while Jared is faced with a cultural clash at his new temp job, and Christian is having girl problems.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug and Wendy meet with a marriage counselor who assigns them intimacy "homework", Tammy and Tommy go on a juice cleanse and the family takes an IQ test to find out who's the smartest one.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Jared and Tommy get some quality guy time in but it may be a little too much for Jared to handle. Chris finds out that Christian has a boyfriend and invites him over for a family barbeque.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Chris is at war with some teenage kids who are tearing up his lawn while Jared panics after pawning Michelle's grandmother's necklace. Tommy is worried that Hunter is growing up too fast and Doug questions Wendy's sexuality.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug does some retail therapy and makes a very expensive purchase that doesn't go over too well with Wendy. Jared is determined to have a pool in his backyard and Tommy & Tammy host a couple of fans at their house for the weekend.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Chris and Aimee face a big challenge by trying to bond with their kids while Doug can't recall the crazy night he and Wendy had at the bar. Jared befriends a blind man and tests what it's like to be blind for 24 hours.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Brody loses a tooth but when the tooth fairy fails to deliver, Doug has to step up to the plate. Michelle leaves for a night and leaves a desperate Jared on diaper duty while Aimee tries to convince Chris to marry her.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: The guys try to toughen up Mason and Brody's survival skills while Tommy has his acting debut in his first film.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Jared finishes his last temp job before hunting scene and finally changes a diaper. Tammy and Tommy experiment in the bedroom, and Doug may finally get some action the bedroom.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: The Clampets are settled back home and facing a whole new set of challenges. Mason has found young love and is putting Chris and Aimee's parenting skills to the test.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: There's a wedding going on at Chris and Aimee's and you are not going to believe who's it is! Doug and Wendy are newly separated, and Jared has a new money making venture.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Steve Austin invites eight badasses in the country to battle head to head on his ranch. The last man standing takes on the Skullbuster obstacle course for a chance to win $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Steve welcomes his first eight women to the ranch to compete in head to head competition. They'll face Trench Warfare, the Pulverizer, and the Junkyard to earn the right to take on Steve's Skullbuster and a chance at $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: The power of the beards invades the Broken Skull Challenge as eight tough-as-nails male athletes compete in Snatch, Stacked and Chained up for a chance to win $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight new women come to the Broken Skull Challenge to go head to head in Snatch, Stacked and Chained Up. The winner goes on to get a shot at Steve's Skullbuster and his $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Fresh meat go head to head at the Broken Skull Challenge as eight new men take on Possession, Loaded and the Grip & Rip to try and prove they are the toughest badass in the country and take home $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight new women arrive at the ranch to fight head to head in Possession, Loaded and Grip & Rip to earn a spot in Steve Austin's Skullbuster and a shot to win $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight new male competitors go through three grueling rounds of competition, including Drag Race, Bagged, and Blowout. One of them will earn the right to take on the Skullbuster, and a chance at $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Steve Austin brings in his toughest group of women yet to compete in Drag Race, Bagged, and Blowout. Only one will earn the right to take on his Skullbuster and a chance to win $10,000.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 04/21/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Koreatown in Los Angeles, where he finds a tight-knit community marked by the 1992 Rodney King riots.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 05/05/2013. Chefs and restauranteurs Fred Morin and Dave McMillan, of Joe Beef’s, take us across Canada by rail.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 05/12/2013. Anthony Bourdain explores the "Interzone,” where artists like Burroughs, Bowles and the Rolling Stones sought escape from Western moral prohibitions.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown

programme.title: United Shades of America

programme.title: United Shades of America
programme.desc: Aired 6/16/2019. Kamau visits Philadelphia and Chester, Pennsylvania to learn about the toxic man-made disasters that have polluted these communities for generations.

programme.title: United Shades of America
programme.desc: Aired 4/28/2019. Kamau visits Dallas, TX - the home of the Megachurch, to find out what is creating the new face of Christianity today, in a city where church and state are far from separate.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer tracks a suspect down a treacherous cliffside, a man puts his brother and elderly father at risk, and a man asks police to take his son to jail.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A convenience store sprinter bets officers he'll get away next time, matching bullets help solve an armed robbery, and a trucker takes his family on a supersized car chase.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A Special Operations Unit coordinates a city-wide “buy bust” sting designed to apprehend street level drug dealers. Officers join units in pursuit of a stolen SUV. An officer arrests two brothers for public intoxication.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A wild-eyed man leads police on a chase that ends in a Tasing, officers respond to an in-progress lovers' spat, and a traffic stop results in drug and auto theft charges.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A traffic stop takes a surprising turn when a suspect creates a spur-of-the-moment diversion, and a soft-spoken driver has difficulty being upfront with the officers.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A first-time offender brings officers on an intense car chase, deputies respond to an armed robbery, and a routine traffic stop ends in multiple arrests.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect collides with another driver while fleeing from police, deputies mediate an altercation over a bag of chips, and officers respond to a domestic dispute.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers subdue a mentally unwell man, a driver is arrested for crystal meth possession after his passengers incriminate him, and an arrested suspect apologizes to his son.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A fleet-footed deputy nabs a suspect on the run, officers responding to a domestic call are refused entry, and police try to ascertain the cause of a woman's hallucinations.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man caught shoplifting gets an earful from his fed-up mom, police use surveillance video to track down an armed robber, and deputies oversee a contentious custody exchange.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police pursue a stolen motorcycle that turns into a foot chase. A domestic violence call results in the arrest of an abusive stepdad. Officers respond after a fight over cigarettes escalate.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies are led on a chase by a driver they pursued just weeks earlier, and a man caught with drugs tries to pin the blame on his girlfriend.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Watching football turns a couple against each other, a cop gets fed up with a repeat shoplifter, and a man tries to swallow a bag of marijuana before officers find it.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies work together to stay on the tail of a fleeing vehicle. An argumentative driver keeps his friends tuned in as he livestreams his own arrest. A mother’s desire to scare her daughter into behaving takes a serious turn.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Carjacking victims flag down officers whom then locate, pursue and acquire the stolen vehicle, and a man admits to officers the car he's driving is stolen.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Tinted car windows draw suspicion from a roaming patrol, a concerned friend gets a punch in the nose, and a traffic stop leads police a meth pipe in an odd place.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A cyclist sends officers on a frantic foot-chase through a neighborhood, and when searching a building, police find a woman hiding in a cupboard.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A decoy vehicle is strategically abandoned in a public parking lot. An officer responds to a burglary in progress call at a local tire store. Officers respond to a domestic call at a nearby trailer park.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A stolen U-Haul is seized during a felony traffic stop. An unfaithful husband is caught hiding his mistress in the bathroom. Police assist an individual who is going through self-discovery.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: During a traffic stop, a driver drops off his passenger before speeding away. Deputies are amazed when a man offers them an ID that looks nothing like him. Deputies investigate a case of road rage involving a gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A distressed woman leads the cops to her abusive fiance, and a couple of officers are suspicious when they pull over an overly friendly man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Recovery of a stolen vehicle uncovers a weapon and a lengthy criminal history. Detectives cross paths with a car that was stolen in a carjacking. Officers speak with a man who has questionable standards regarding gun safety.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer on street patrol chases down a suspect on foot, an alleged car thief posts his exploits on Facebook, and a crashed stolen car may not have been stolen after all.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A daring driver takes officers on a wild ride, a man offers a bizarre excuse for the items found in his car, and a man is arrested after threatening his neighbor with a gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A wanted suspect tries to hide from officers, a woman calls deputies to apprehend her hostile husband, and a passenger tries to outrun the police during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man in New Jersey is arrested for possession. A couple is pulled over while driving around a known drug zone looking to score and the boyfriend is arrested for an outstanding warrant. A routine traffic stop turns into a fruitful drug bust.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man leads Officers on a pursuit across county lines. An Officer assists in an undercover sting to capture drug dealers. An Officer finds a gun in a suspects car.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: While processing the house where several showgirls were murdered, Sara is haunted by the terrified eyes and cryptic dying words of the sixth victim she discovers.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Greg is forced to again contend with the hostile mother and brother of the hoodlum he killed in self-defense several months ago when the CSI team discovers that the brother is involved in a new murder case.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: While Grissom and the rest of the CSIs are out investigating new cases, Hodges leads Archie, Henry, Mandy and Wendy to believe that Grissom wants them to secretly band together that evening in an attempt to solve the four miniature killer cases.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: In their attempt to identify the murderer of a has-been boxer who lived among a group of prostitutes who detested him, the CSIs must establish which of several life-threatening acts against him in one night actually killed him.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the murder of a blackjack dealer whose estranged husband has ties to a club of UFO believers.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Sara is uneasy about Grissom being reunited with Lady Heather during the CSIs' investigation of her attempted murder by a client she refuses to name.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: As the CSI team comes closer than ever to identifying the miniature killer, Sara mysteriously goes missing, forcing her relationship with Grissom out into the open.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Sara's fate remains in question as the CSI team rushes to find out if she survived an attack by the miniature killer, on the eighth season premiere.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates two unusual cases, one involving the suspicious death of a go-cart racer who took his hobby to the highway and paid the price with his life, and a murder at a hip new restaurant where patrons dine in the dark.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the murder of an entire family, except for one daughter, who supposedly is possessed by the devil.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team discover a young man strangled to death by hanging ...whose body looks like that of a woman.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team goes behind the scenes at a horror porn film studio to investigate the murder of a slasher film actress murdered on the set of one of her movies.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: In Part One of a Two-Part crossover episode to conclude on Without A Trace, a kidnap victim from New York who went missing six years ago may be the same boy whose death Grissom and the CSI team are investigating in Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A suspect from Sara's past returns, causing her to question her future as a CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mientras el equipo de CSI se acerca más que nunca a la identificación del asesino en miniatura, Sara desaparece misteriosamente, lo que obliga a sacar a la luz su relación con Grissom.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El destino de Sara sigue siendo una incógnita mientras el equipo de CSI se apresura a averiguar si ha sobrevivido al ataque del asesino en miniatura, en el estreno de la octava temporada.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI investiga dos casos inusuales. La muerte de un conductor de go-carts cuyo cuerpo decapitado se encuentra a metros de la carretera por la que corría, y el misterioso asesinato en un restaurante donde los clientes cenan en la oscuridad.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI investiga el asesinato de toda una familia, excepto el de una hija que supuestamente está poseída por el diablo.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo descubren a un joven estrangulado hasta morir ahorcado ...cuyo cuerpo parece el de una mujer.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI se adentra entre bastidores en un estudio de cine porno de terror para investigar el asesinato de una actriz de cine slasher asesinada en el plató de una de sus películas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: En la primera parte de un episodio crossover de dos partes que concluirá en Without A Trace, una víctima de secuestro de Nueva York que desapareció hace seis años puede ser el mismo chico cuya muerte Grissom y el equipo de CSI están investigando.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un sospechoso del pasado de Sara regresa, haciendo que se cuestione su futuro como CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: La adicción de Warrick a las pastillas empieza a afectar a su trabajo cuando su investigación sobre la mafia clandestina de Las Vegas le convierte en el principal sospechoso de un asesinato relacionado con la mafia.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Hodges tiene segundas intenciones cuando escenifica hipotéticos asesinatos en el laboratorio para dar a sus colegas la oportunidad de jugar a ser CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo se adentran en el mundo de las peleas ilegales de perros para averiguar quién es el responsable de la muerte de una acaudalada dama de la alta sociedad.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo investigan dos asesinatos que tienen lugar en el rodeo anual de monta de toros de Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo luchan contra la gripe cuando el fiscal Klein les pide que investiguen la muerte de varios testigos clave para un caso del gran jurado contra una peligrosa banda de Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: La inquietante muerte de una niña de 3 años tiene un gran impacto en Catherine mientras busca pistas sobre su asesinato.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSIs expose the seedy underbelly of children’s beauty pageants when a contestant's mom is murdered.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: An eccentric genius is assassinated with the most unique weapon the CSIs have ever seen.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a skydiver is murdered, the CSIs discover that he has more than 100 children and all of them are suspects.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the sisters of a Miami sorority are knocked off one by one, the CSIs try to end the murder spree.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a neighborhood do-gooder is murdered, Horatio and the CSIs discover that he was planning to blow the whistle on something big.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the Miami Taunter kills again, Horatio comes face-to-face with the matriarch of the suspected killer's family, who may or may not help his investigation.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a beloved tennis coach is nearly killed, Calleigh discovers a personal connection to the case.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio uncovers a corruption scandal that pits him against an old adversary, and Calleigh makes a life-changing decision.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When one of the CSI's biggest enemies is murdered, Horatio must determine which of his team members is a suspect.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Megan Donner returns to the CSI unit in time to work on a jet crash in the Everglades. They discover a victim five miles from the crash.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After fishermen catch a tiger shark and discover a partial human torso in its stomach, evidence leads the team to suspect murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a rape and a murder takes place on a Miami beach, Horatio and the team are sent to investigate the mansion of the Hamilton family.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When his mentor is killed while defusing a bomb, Horatio goes on a personal mission to find the culprit. Megan wonders if he is too close to the case.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a priest is murdered, Horatio and the team must investigate. A lip print on a drinking glass sets a 12-year-old altar boy as a prime suspect.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI investiga el aparente asesinato de una universitaria, mientras que Delko tiene misteriosas visiones del difunto Tim Speedle.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Después de que Internet convierte a una alumna de secundaria en un símbolo sexual internacional, la información divulgada sobre Horatio pone su vida en peligro.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo de CSI buscan exhaustivamente al hijo de Horatio después de que desaparece durante una sorprendente y mortal fuga de prisión.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Asesinan a una leyenda del deporte y la investigación se complica cuando el laboratorio pierde el cuerpo. Horatio y el equipo de CSI investigan.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Acontecimientos extraños empiezan a afectar al equipo de CSI mientras persiguen a un asesino en serie que atacó durante un eclipse total de sol.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando una modelo se electrocuta en la pasarela, el caso lleva a Horatio y al equipo de CSI de vuelta al hijo de Horatio y a su archienemigo.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando unas vacaciones familiares se vuelven mortales, el equipo de CSI debe encontrar al asesino antes de que los supervivientes hagan justicia por mano propia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Un atentado contra la vida de Calleigh pone en peligro su vida personal y profesional. Horatio y el equipo de CSI investigan.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El estilo de vida de los ricos y famosos está bajo el microscopio de Horatio y el equipo de CSI cuando la niñera de una familia adinerada aparece muerta.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando una ametralladora rara e ilegal evapora a tres contrabandistas de armas, el equipo de CSI debe encontrar al asesino antes de que el arma cause más muertes.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: El vengador del futuro
programme.desc: Es el año 2084 D.C.y a Doug Quaid lo persiguen sueños recurrentes de un viaje a Marte, el planeta vecino más cercano a la Tierra. Vive en una época que ha sobrevivido otra guerra mundial y donde las elecciones para el gobierno ya no existen.

programme.title: A contrarreloj
programme.desc: En este fascinante thriller, el jefe de Policía (Denzel Washington) de una pequeña ciudad, se ve inmerso en graves problemas al investigar el asesinato de una mujer con la que mantenía una relación en secreto porque todas las pruebas apuntan a él.

programme.title: Un crimen inesperado
programme.desc: El hijo de un oficial de la policía de Nueva York asesinado se une a la fuerza y cae en línea con el ex compañero de su padre, y un equipo de policías deshonestos.

programme.title: Todo incluido
programme.desc: Una familia de vacaciones se ve obligada a esconderse en su habitación de hotel cuando un huracán arrasa el centro turístico, donde pronto empiezan a revelarse verdades que han permanecido ocultas durante mucho tiempo.

programme.title: Una mujer sin filtro
programme.desc: Paz, una amable mujer, permitió que todos alrededor de ella la trataran como si no fuera nada, manteniendo el silencio para no herir ningún sentimiento. Hasta que un día, un fenómeno fuerza su cabeza a expresar lo que siente.

programme.title: Veneno
programme.desc: El origen y ascenso del luchador dominicano más famoso de todos los tiempos, Rafael Sánchez alias Jack Veneno, y su archienemigo, José Manuel Guzmán alias Relámpago Hernández.

programme.title: Ilusiones S.A.
programme.desc: Para hacer feliz a su mujer, un hombre contrata a una empresa que crea fantasías para fingir que su nieto, quien los dejó hace años, es un hombre de bien. Pero el verdadero nieto, quien es en realidad un delincuente, se aparece exigiendo dinero.

programme.title: Perfectos desconocidos
programme.desc: Cuando un grupo de mejores amigos se reúne durante un eclipse lunar para compartir una cena íntima en la elegante casa de Eva y Antonio, sospechan que se trata de otra noche cualquiera hasta que la anfitriona les propone un juego.

programme.title: Una mujer sin filtro
programme.desc: Paz, una amable mujer, permitió que todos alrededor de ella la trataran como si no fuera nada, manteniendo el silencio para no herir ningún sentimiento. Hasta que un día, un fenómeno fuerza su cabeza a expresar lo que siente.

programme.title: No eres tú, soy yo
programme.desc: Después de la ruptura de su reciente matrimonio, Javier se encuentra en una depresión de la que ni siquiera un psiquiatra puede ayudarlo a salir. Sin embargo, la esperanza está en camino en la forma improbable de sus exnovias.

programme.title: Carrie (2002)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis protagoniza esta adaptación de la clásica historia de terror de Stephen King. Carrie es una chica tímida con poderes telequinéticos y cuando sus torturadores la someten a un acto de humillación, todos aprenderán una lección mortal.

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: Anna Paquin protagoniza este thriller en el que caracteriza a una adolescente cuya vida cambia cuando su familia se muda a una nueva casa con secretos. Poco después una serie de sucesos sobrenaturales desencadenarán el mal que habita en la casa.

programme.title: Drácula 2000
programme.desc: El maestro del terror Wes Craven presenta una adaptación moderna y sexy del clásico thriller gótico. Luego de que Drácula despierta de su sueño de 100 años, su primer destino es Estados Unidos y la exótica ciudad de Nueva Orleans.

programme.title: Event Horizon: La nave de la muerte
programme.desc: En 2047, un equipo de astronautas se embarca en una misión para recuperar una nave espacial. Sin embargo, esta simple tarea los conducirá a algo mucho más aterrador de lo que imaginaban.

programme.title: Mimic
programme.desc: Del director ganador del Óscar, Guillermo del Toro (THE SHAPE OF WATER), llega una batalla, el hombre y la naturaleza. El milagro de la ingeniería creado en el laboratorio evolucionó y comenzó a imitar al depredador más peligroso de todos: el humano.

programme.title: Caso 39
programme.desc: Renée Zellweger, ganadora de un Oscar, protagoniza la película de suspenso sobrenatural de una trabajadora social, que tiene asignado el raro e inquietante caso de Lillith Sullivan, una niña con un extraño y misterioso pasado.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy protagoniza a un Norbit apacible, que recibe una segunda oportunidad con el amor de su infancia, Kate. Sin embargo, los obstáculos podrían complicar este romance más de lo esperado.

programme.title: Gambit

programme.title: Verano de locura

programme.title: South Park: Más grande, más larga y sin censura

programme.title: El dictador
programme.desc: Los creadores y las estrellas de Borat traen esta asombrosa comedia sobre lo que pasa cuando el peor dictador del mundo llega a los Estados Unidos ¡Prepárate para llorar de risa con esta comedia delirante y bochornosamente divertida!

programme.title: Nacho Libre

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: El Negocio de Metales
programme.desc: Los médicos no pueden identificar el origen de la enfermedad de un empresario.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un violador en serie anda suelto en una ciudad de Texas. Nadie sabía dónde atacaría a continuación, pero la audacia de sus ataques y la escalada de violencia contra sus víctimas hicieron que encontrarlo fuera imperativo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando se encuentra muerta a Leann Fletcher, los investigadores usan análisis de salpicaduras de sangre y computación forense para encontrar el motivo de su asesinato: su esposo, estaba teniendo una aventura con la jueza Susan Chrzanowski.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una niña de 13 años desapareció de su casa en Colorado y la única evidencia que dejó el secuestrador fueron tres huellas digitales en la cortina de una ventana.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: El asesino probablemente esperaba cubrir sus huellas escenificando la escena del crimen. Pero los investigadores descubrieron el intento casi de inmediato y recurrieron a la ciencia forense para saber qué sucedió esa noche realmente.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: El 12 de Mayo de 1994, Crystal Perry fue asesinado viciosamente en su casa en Bridgton, Maine. Michael Hutchinson, de 32 años, fue encontrado culpable del asesinato.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Una pastilla amarga para tragar
programme.desc: Se cuenta la historia de la bombero Michelle Baker. Después de conocer al Dr. Maynard Muntzing, quedó embarazada de él. Después de esta noticia, ella se enfermaba siempre que estaban juntos.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un hombre rico y su esposa fueron atacados por tres hombres enmascarados fuera de su lujosa casa en Louisiana. A él le dispararon hasta causarle la muerte y a ella la obligaron a abrir la caja fuerte que tenían escondida.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un niño de quince años muere a causa de una misteriosa herida de bala en la cabeza mientras está sentado en el vestíbulo del club de armas de su padre.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La policía obtiene una pista sobre una pareja que desapareció en el fin de semana del Día de los Caídos durante un robo en marcha. La evidencia que se encuentra resuelve el brutal crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 2005, el cuerpo de la joven madre, Summer Baldwin, fue encontrado en una maleta en un vertedero de Texas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Los jóvenes navajos del suroeste estaban muriendo a un ritmo alarmante. Los curanderos de la tribu proporcionaron a los investigadores una pista fundamental que llevaría al otro lado del mundo al asesino más improbable.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un vecino vio cómo un hombre apuñalaba a su esposa, la empujaba a la piscina y le metía la cabeza bajo el agua.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran muerta a la esposa de un dentista bien conocido, la policía se esfuerza por identificar a un sospechoso. Algunas fibras y un estudio de los patrones climáticos en la noche del asesinato abren el caso y revelan al asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En la víspera de Navidad de 2005, se encuentra el cuerpo de un hombre ardiendo cerca de Baltimore. Finalmente fue identificado como Wesley Person, de 26 años.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de inspeccionar el daño de una tormenta en un hogar en Tampa, un asesor de seguros simplemente desapareció. Treinta horas después, su cuerpo apareció en un río cercano. Pero el asesino había sido descuidado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando un joven bombero murió de lo que parecía ser una enfermedad cardíaca grave pero no diagnosticada, su familia y amigos quedaron devastados, pero no tenían pruebas de algún juego sucio.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En el 2002, el director de la funeraria, Lonnie Turner, fue encontrado muerto a tiros. Su hijo, Lonnie júnior, se convirtió en el principal sospechoso, particularmente después de que se descubriera que el asesinato se cometió con su arma.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1996, la policía de Virginia Beach llegó al departamento de Makdessi para encontrar los cuerpos ensangrentados de Elise Makdessi y de Quincy Brown, un soldado de la Marina. ¿Pero era el amante de Elise o su agresor?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Por lo general, es fácil determinar cómo un criminal entró en la escena del crimen. Pero en este caso, estaba lejos de esclarecerse. Parecía que el asesino se desvaneció y quizá lo hizo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1992, Laura Houghteling desapareció de su casa en Bethesda y nunca más se la volvió a ver. Los científicos forenses usan evidencia de su habitación para dirigir a la policía hacia un sospechoso principal.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Uno para llevar

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Placas y mentiras
programme.desc: Un estudiante universitario fue encontrado muerto y la evidencia sugirió que conocía a su asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una fría noche de Diciembre de 1993, Rose Larner se detuvo en una tienda cuando se dirigía a la casa de su novio. Nunca más se la vio ni se supo de ella.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: During Spirit Week at Degrassi, everyone has something to prove. Cam feels threatened by Zig, Dallas makes a flirty bet with Alli, and Eli's relationship with Clare is tested.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When tragedy strikes at Degrassi, everyone deals with the situation in a different way. As the students struggle to cope, Simpson cancels Spirit Week.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After Drew moves out, there's a break-in at the loft, and Fiona fears for her safety. Someone from Dallas' past pays him a surprise visit. A tough assignment forces Zig to think about the mistakes he's made.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona takes drastic measures to feel safer at home, and puts herself in danger. Dallas avoids telling Alli the truth about his past. After blowing off a French assignment, Zig tries to impress the teacher,

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Maya lets loose at a party and posts a video online, hoping it'll change her image. The battle for the student council presidency heats up when Drew enters the race. Connor tries to play matchmaker for his friends.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After a stressful audition, Maya tosses her cello in the trash, and decides to have more fun. The competition between Drew and Clare intensifies. Connor offers Eli some advice about love.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: School's out and summer's in! A few lucky Degrassi students are bound for a once-in-a-lifetime trip to Paris, accompanied by some fresh new faces. And then there are others playing counselor at Degrassi Day Camp.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: School's out and summer's in! A few lucky Degrassi students are bound for a once-in-a-lifetime trip to Paris, accompanied by some fresh new faces. And then there are others playing counselor at Degrassi Day Camp.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Despite her illness, Clare is determined to remain a regular girl. Alli is lonely in Paris and tries to make the best of it without her BF and Tristan tries to 'bro' up while rooming with the guys.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare receives crushing news while waiting for her MRI results. Needing time away from the hospital, Clare convinces Drew to help her escape.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Why is Becky blowing Adam off to spend time with Todd? Who's Todd? Adam is not liking this long-distance relationship thing. Alli is falling hard for her Parisian waiter and worries maybe too hard too fast?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Adam takes Dallas' advice and tries juggling two girls at once. But he's not that kind of guy. When upset Tristan goes AWOL in Paris, Maya enlists her sworn enemy for help find him and Alli continues to try and find balance in her relationships.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Leo and Alli are getting to feel really serious. Distraught Drew needs to visit camp for comfort. Maya must show up Zoë and puts an expensive dress on her mother's credit card… nothing could possibly go wrong, right? !

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As summer comes to an end, Becky tries to understand the meaning behind an unexpected tragedy.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After the devastating loss of Adam, the Degrassi students try their best to move on but when it's your brother… And fitting in is hard for Zoë because she's never just been a normal girl. Alli reunites with Leo on her home turf.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew does his best as Degrassi President but without sleep, he's not much good. By Drew's side, Zoë becomes the first lady of Degrassi. Leo does damage control and tries to get in with Alli's friends.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The opportunity to write for a real-life magazine is offered to Clare but her brain after cancer is not cooperating.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Miles helps Maya discover who is behind her video going viral. Maya's hellbent on revenge, getting her into hot water.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Natural World

programme.desc: The life of the first reptilian carnivores on Earth, told through computer animation.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: With wings longer than those of a small plane, pterosaurs were the largest creatures ever known to have flown.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: This programme looks at the Cretaceous period, 106 million years ago. Volcanic activity forces the continents apart, and dinosaurs diversify into a range of species to cope with environmental extremes.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A widow's retriever mix and two fox terriers do not get along; a Shar-Pei/Doberman mix drools excessively on car rides; Cesar revisits a Rottweiler mix.

programme.desc: After a 45-day stint in Iraq and two hurricanes, an explosive-sniffing ATF Labrador retriever begins exhibiting severe symptoms of terror.

programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier who became aggressive after going blind; a spoiled Pekingese/miniature poodle mix; a Rottweiler with a dangerous obsession with the horses on the ranch where she lives.

programme.desc: Cesar helps a disrespectful yellow Lab who causes chaos everywhere she goes and some dogs who are misbehaving at the office.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!

programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files, Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.

programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School, and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different from the all-girls private school she attended.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team, Baby Lyssa decides she will step up in this hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission--convince Duane Lee to meet with him.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a runaway fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on, the lame Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder, Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows, only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold, it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan, so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk holds the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince the family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job, and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: New series focusing on the tumultuous home and professional life of bounty hunter Dwayne "Dog" Chapman, and his partner and wife Beth. In the first episode, Dog and team chase Floyd Chapman (no relation), a heavily tattooed bail jumper.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: In Hawaii, Dog sets off from Honolulu to Kona to help his son Leland with some of his fugitives. First, a stop at Leland's boxing gym to warm up for their day of hunting with a quick sparring session and some father-and-son time together.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to liven things up with a competition. He and Beth will hunt for one fugitive, while Leland and Justin chase another. The winner will be the duo that captures its fugitive first. Will Dog keep bragging rights as the Best Bounty Hunter in

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is hunting a man known as The Godfather of Waikiki. Dog and Beth bailed him out as a courtesy, but now he is refusing to go to court. If Dog doesn't bring him in, it could cost him more than money; he may lose his respect on the street.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: In Seattle, Jeff and Blake learn the woman who died in the plane crash with Peter DeVilbis cannot be positively identified, but the ring she was wearing is indeed Fallon's wedding band. Back in Denver, Fallon's moving funeral is held.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant must dive into the water and swim down to a city bus. On a table, there are dishes of roaches. Players are given fifty cow brains with a FF chip hidden inside. Contestants must make the way across a maze of beams.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: The contestant is placed in a specially designed clear bag. A tank is filled with millipedes, roaches and worms. Contestant is standing on one of four 8-foot tall 16-foot long Plexiglas walls suspended high above the ground.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be riding in the back of a truck driving down a pier. Players will have to clear tables to uncover a three-digit combination written on the glass top of each of the tables. Contestant must drive their car under a semi truck.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: There will be a boat that is towing three rafts. A Plexiglas bottom covered in pig parts. The child stands under a large metal shower-head and pulls a chain. Suspended above the water. The kid must climb through the tubes and traverse.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants must leap back and forth from the boats to get as many flags. Contestant is put into a vat used for stomping on grapes to make wine. Contestant must walk the length of the truck removing flags along the way.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: The contestant must slide down two cables while standing on a small platform. One at a time, contestants pick gifts from under a Christmas tree. Contestants must swim underneath a 20 foot by 40-foot Plexiglas grid that is lit on fire.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will be placed on a platform floating in the water, where they will grab a skid of the helicopter. Player is chained between two poles and covered with bees. Contestants will be seated in the front of a car suspended over the water.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be contected to a dune buggy by his ankles. Contestant will have to bury their spouse's head in worms using only their mouth. One person from each team will be hanging from the skids of a helicopter.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be chained to either side of a platform with the contestant having one key to free them from chains. Player dunks their head into a tank and retrieves a cows heart with their mouth.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: In this couples stunt, partners will hang by their ankles, they will each hold onto one end of a rope and be lifted over the water. Couples will use their mouths to root around in pies made from wax worms, pigs stomach, fish sauce and duck tongue.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Player A is placed on a dunk tank. In the tank is a mixture of cow parts floating in water. One member of the team will be suspended by their ankles underneath a helicopter.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: In this stunt, the female contestant will be placed in a cage that is hung from a helicopter and is approx. 20 feet in the air. A dumpster filled with disgusting garbage is placed at one end of an alley.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be standing on a beam that is suspended high in the air. Player is placed in a coffin with 100 chicken feet and is then covered in rats. Couples stunt one of the team members is hog tied by four ropes and suspended.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Two contestants are seated in the front of a car. The driver is blind folded and the passenger must navigate for them. Player is strapped down in a coffin and then covered with 500 Tarantulas.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappears without a trace. Even though foul play is suspected, the leads don't pan out and the trail turns cold. Twenty years would pass before police are able to link a clump of hair discovered in an isolated area with the missing woman.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Alaskan hikers discover a body wrapped in sheets which were edged in orange stitching. Investigators find a tuft of red carpet fibers clinging to the sheet — threads of evidence which lead them straight to the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators find a shoe print, several foreign hairs and unknown fingerprints at a murder scene. But they believe the most telling piece of evidence is the bite mark on the victim's chest.
