programme.title: Thomas Hearns vs Roberto Duran
programme.desc: On June 15th, 1984 Thomas Hearns fought Roberto Duran for WBC World Super Welterweight title at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas that resulted in a technical knockout victory in the second round by Hearns.

programme.title: Timothy Bradley vs Manny Pacquiao I
programme.desc: On June 9th, 2012 Manny Pacquiao and Timothy Bradley started their trilogy at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas in a battle for the WBO World Welterweight title that ended in a split decision win for Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: Giovani Santillan vs Angel Ruiz
programme.desc: On October 15th, 2021 Giovani Santillan and Angel Ruiz fought eachother in a 10 round bout at the Pechanga Arena in San Diego resulting in a victory for Santillan.

programme.title: James Toney vs Charles Williams
programme.desc: On July 29th, 1994 James Toney and Charles Williams battled eachother for IBF World Super Middleweight titles at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas resulting in a knockout victory for James Toney.

programme.title: Ray Mercer vs Tommy Morrison
programme.desc: On October 18th, 1991 Ray Mercer faced Tommy Morrison for the WBO World Heavyweight titles at the Convention Center in Atlantic City ending in technical knockout by Mercer earning him the victory and title but, he relinquished the title shortly after.

programme.title: Rob Brant vs Ryota Murata 1
programme.desc: On October 20th, 2018 Rob Brant faced Ryota Murata for a second time for the WBA World Middleweight title at the Park Theater in Las Vegas that ended in a unanimous decision victory for Brant.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Mac Foster
programme.desc: On April 1st, 1972 Muhammad Ali and Mac Foster fought in a fifteen round bout that ended in a unanimous decision win for Ali.

programme.title: Jose Ramirez vs Amir Imam
programme.desc: On March 17th, 2018 Jose Ramirez fought Amir Imam for the vacant WBC World Super Lightweight title at Madison Square Garden Hulu Theater in New York with the twelve-round bout ending in a unanimous decision win for Ramirez.

programme.title: Lloyd Honeyghan vs Donald Curry
programme.desc: On September 27th, 1986 Lloyd Honeyghan faced Donald Curry for the IBF, WBA and WBC World Welterweight title at the Caesars Palace in Atlantic City in a 15 round bout that ended in the sixth giving Honeyghan the win.

programme.title: James Toney vs Freddie Delgado
programme.desc: On June 18th, 1995 James Toney fought Freddie Delgado at the Performing Arts Theater in New Orleans with the bout ending in the fifth round technical knockout victory for Toney.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Delvin Rodriguez
programme.desc: On October 5th, 2013 Miguel Cotto battled Delvin Rodriguez at the Amway Center in Orlando, Fl. The originally twelve round bout lasted three rounds and ended by technical knockout in third round securing the victory for Cotto.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs David Diaz
programme.desc: On June 28th, 2008 Manny Pacquiao and David Diaz fought eachother at Mandalay Bay Events Center in Las Vegas for the WBC World Lightweight titles with Diaz going down in the ninth round Pacquiao secured his victory.

programme.title: Teofimo Lopez vs Pedro Campa
programme.desc: On August 13th, 2022, Teofimo Lopez fought Pedro Campa for the NABF & WBO International Super Lightweight Titles in Las Vegas. Teofimo looked confident and quick from the start, wearing down Campa until he finally stopped him in the 7th round.

programme.title: Mike Tyson vs Henry Tillman
programme.desc: On June 16th, 1990 Mike Tyson defeated Henry Tillman at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas in a bout supposed to last ten rounds but ended after one in a quick win for Tyson.

programme.title: Jose Zepeda vs Ivan Baranchyk
programme.desc: On October 3rd, 2020 Jose Zepeda faced Ivan Baranchyk in a battle for WBC silver super light weight title at the Bubble at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas with both opponents going down it ended in a victory for Zepeda.

programme.title: Josh Taylor vs Jose Ramirez
programme.desc: On May 22nd, 2021, Josh Taylor fought Jose Ramirez for the undisputed super lightweight title in Las Vegas. With a lot of bad blood going into the fight, Josh Taylor prevailed, winning by a close unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Mike Tyson vs Lorenzo Canady
programme.desc: On August 15th, 1985 Mike Tyson and Lorenzo Canady fought eachother at Resorts International in Atlantic City that resulted in Tyson defeating Canady in the first round by Knockout.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: After Josh reluctantly takes the task of finding a man and his wife's pet ewe, he becomes the butt of many jokes in the community while cattlemen nearly hang him when he mentions sheep.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When a convicted killer escapes prison, Josh is hired for $500 to protect the woman whose testimony put him there.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh rides into a town looking for a man who asked him to come there for a job that pays $500.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is hired by Harry Weaver to track down his twin brother Pete, who's wanted with a $500 bounty on him.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is called in to track down a new outlaw - the local sheriff who is a friend.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh reluctantly takes a job protecting a beautiful deaf, mute, teenage girl and keeping everyone off the father's place for a day or two.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh escorts an East Coast photographer to take a picture of his friend El Gato (The Cat), who is a famous, hilarious bandit living in the hills of Mexico with a small army.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A broke Josh is hired by a fearful man to help him elope with his sweetheart, Jane, the daughter of a local rancher.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh takes a job for $200 protecting an express office employee who stole $10,000 and wants to return it before it's discovered missing.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A Japanese woman travels to the U.S. to find an American man who proposed to her in Japan and hires Josh to find him since no one will help her in her search.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh arrives in town thinking the sheriff summoned him to go after a man.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh rides to Barney Durant's horse business to rent a couple of horses right after Barney pushes his son David to leave.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: While pursuing Carl Martin, Josh stops at a marshal's office where Carl is being held.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When phony wanted posters put a price on the head of a retired Confederate officer, Colonel Sykes' daughter summons Josh Randall to help keep the bounty hunters at bay.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A reclusive old man with an Apache bodyguard is wanted for a crime committed long ago.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A ranch manager hires Randall to bring back a line rider charged with grand theft.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is rooked into advancing half the bounty to a man who promises to lead him to the wanted criminal Shawnee Bill, but Bill may be closer than Randall thinks.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A banker with a consuming thirst for vengeance hires Randall to accompany him to track down the man he believes responsible for his son's death and a bank robbery.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is deputized to transport a ruthless killer to Tucson but exchanges him for the nun kidnapped by the killer's gang.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall brings a suspected murderer to Pot Hole but fears the man won't receive a fair trial when he finds the townspeople in the grip of a power-mad bully.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When Josh, as a favor to a friend, escorts a beautiful woman to a trial that could see her hang for killing her husband, her lover, and a foreman, she charms him to convince her of her innocenences.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is asked by Stacy Torrance for help when she finds a wanted poster under her door - for her for murder.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Owing a favor to a sheriff, Josh agrees against better judgment to go to the lawless town of Bent Horn to bring back a man wanted for bank robbery and murder.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh sets out to help a heartbroken wife locate her missing husband, but his mission of mercy meets with a resistant and tight-lipped townspeople.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is bushwhacked by bounty hunters in cahoots with the local sheriff, who now must keep Josh from blowing the whistle on their illegal but lucrative \\"bounty game\\".

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A sadistic pair of killers escape from prison who have no qualms about killing.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Following an Indian attack on their stagecoach that kills his prisoner, Randall and an eastern gentleman unaccustomed to the ways of the West must trek to safety across many long, hot miles of hostile Apache territory.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Hollister doesn't know the identity of the 'brain' directing an epidemic of outlawry in the Territory. But when handsome Horn Burnett and his brother commit murder, the attachment of a rancher's wife for the outlaw gives Clay a hint at the truth.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Sheriff Hollister (Pat Conway) must collect taxes from Galeyville - a nest of outlaws headed by notorious gunman Curly Bill Brocious (Robert Foulk) - which lies in Tombstone Territory. It's a mission he views as leading to an almost certain death.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: After an outlaw escapes from a stagecoach killing, Editor Claibourne spearheads a drive in Tombstone to raise a $5,000 reward for his capture, but this may cause problems for Sheriff Hollister who must also now deal with greedy bounty hunters.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory

programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ race under the ocean; Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and Stripes transform into jungle cats in order to race in the Animal Land Championship, but they must beat a cheating cheetah.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck's baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away; to bring him home, Blaze, AJ, and the King's adorable pet dragon, Zeek, must transform into knights in shining armor.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and his friends join the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: In order to win the race, Blaze and his friends have to get past Crusher and his batch of cheats.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Della helps Survivor Bear explore Ker-Splash's secret caves; the cadets must escape before they're locked in forever; Baddy cheats to try to win the Ker-Splash Canyon Race, and the cadets have to rescue the other racers.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: When Della Dodo's eggs are washed away, the Cadets must save Della's little brothers and sisters; when Baddy takes Trini for a tour of Big Swirl's most dangerous areas, he nearly gets them trapped in Cave-in Cavern.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Penny saves the day when a stranded polar-bear family floats into the warm water near Big Swirl Island; Team Top Wing saves Shirley Squirrely when her giant flying machine nearly crashes into the ocean.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: The Monkey Bandits take Rod's birthday cake and Road-Wing; as Bea helps Brody and Rod earn their Overnight Badge, Baddy McBat tries to scare them, but the Cadets rescue him.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Rod and Brody try to earn a Jungle Exploring badge, but get lost and must work together to help Swift find them; when some lucky students get to be cadets for a day, Top Wing and their junior cadets end up having to rescue their teacher.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Baddy teams up with Betty, Chomps and Rocco to hijack the HQ Command Flyer so he can take over Big Swirl; Davey Hasselhawg has to get Cheep, Chirp and friends ready for an awesome wakeboard show when Brody is called to a rescue.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Rod's beloved Rooster Brewster goes missing in `Arrgh Me Snugglies'; then in `Earl the Gadget Squirrel', Earl the Gadget Squirrel builds Shirley a delivery drone that goes out of control.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher and Pickle become trapped at the top of a tall, rickety tower, Blaze, Stripes and Starla transform into awesome construction vehicles to build a way down.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze transforms into a tow truck and, with AJ and Gabby's help, sets off on an awesome adventure to save Stripes.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Blaze and Crusher discover a medieval kingdom is holding a royal race, the two trucks become knights in order to compete.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ spend the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's mother, father and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a little bunny gets trapped on top of a melting glacier, Blaze must put his new robot powers to the test as he races to the rescue.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: The second Team Truck Challenge pairs trucks together in racing teams and this time Blaze must team up with Crusher.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze, AJ, and Gabby meet a brand new monster machine named Watts - a super fast truck with electric tires; but when one of her special tires goes rolling into the jungle, Blaze, AJ, and Gabby promise to help her get it back.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Crusher steals all of Gabby's tools, and Blaze must help her retrieve them so she can repair the Monster Machines.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul them all back: a Big Rig.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze must help Darington recharge his battery so that he has enough energy to fly to the moon for his next stunt.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: When pirates take the island's precious lemons, the cadets must bring the treasure back to the Lemon Shack; while earning her Map Reading Badge, Penny finds pirates and must rescue the rest of the Top Wing Team.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Brody has to rescue his turbo-surfing pals when they get caught in the Shipwreck Cove whirlpool; Brody and Team Top Wing race to the rescue when Brody's little sister slips off the top of Puffin Peak.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Swift jets to the rescue when Rod's loud, exuberant singing gets him trapped in an avalanche; Swift and Brody have to rely on each other and their buddy navigating skills to lead some geese to safety in the fog.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: The Cadets team up to rescue TV adventure star Survivor Bear, who comes to Big Swirl to brave Icy Summit; when Swift hurts his wing, Timmy Turtle has to help pilot the Flash-Wing to save the day.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: When Rocco and Chomps race off in Penny's Aqua-Wing, she must use Chomp's sub to get it back; as Sandy Stork delivers party treats to the school, the Banana Bandits take her plane.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Penny races to save the lost treasure of Shipwreck Cove and Commodore Smurkturkski; when Rod has to stay in bed with a cold, Penny has to learn to pilot the Road-Wing on the fly.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: The Beavers fix up Ker-Splash Canyon, an amazing water park; when rushing water endangers a group of reclusive Dodos and threatens to destroy the canyon, the Cadets race underground to rescue the Dodos and save the canyon.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher cheats during a tropical island race with Blaze, AJ manages to rescue his best friend while overcoming obstacles.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good; luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires, high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.

programme.desc: Blaze and his friends must race to get to their Halloween candy after Crusher's plan to steal it goes awry, sending their treats far away from Axle City.
